channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How one founder plans to save cities from flooding with terraforming robots
item.description: Instead of building seawalls or dikes, Terranova has developed a new way to raise cities to protect them from sea level rise.

item.title: ‘Landfall’ spyware abused zero-day to hack Samsung Galaxy phones
item.description: A newly identified Android spyware targeted Galaxy devices for close to a year, including users in the Middle East, researchers exclusively tell TechC...

item.title: How to Follow the Trajectory of Comet 3I/Atlas
item.description: The interstellar comet 3I/Atlas reached its closest point to the sun. Here's how to follow the rest of its journey away from our solar system.

item.title: Best Base Layer (2025): Ibex, Smartwool, and More
item.description: Whether you’re layering up for winter cold or looking for an ultralight summer system, we’ve tested and found the best base layers for all your outdoo...

item.title: Texas AG sues Roblox, accusing it of prioritizing ‘pixel pedophiles’ over child safety
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton late on Thursday said he had sued online gaming platform Roblox, accusing the company of "deceiving parents about th...

item.title: Mexico City Is the Most Video-Surveilled Metropolis in the Americas
item.description: Despite 83,000 public cameras, crime in Mexico City remains high—and widespread surveillance raises myriad ethical issues.

item.title: ‘Landfall’ spyware abused zero-day to hack Samsung Galaxy phones
item.description: A newly identified Android spyware targeted Galaxy devices for close to a year, including users in the Middle East, researchers exclusively tell TechC...

item.title: Google, Microsoft, and Meta Have Stopped Publishing Workforce Diversity Data
item.description: Other big tech companies including Amazon, Apple, and Nvidia have continued their annual disclosures this year even as the Trump administration cracks...

item.title: Amazon launches a low-price standalone shopping app, Amazon Bazaar, in over a dozen markets
item.description: On Friday, Amazon announced the debut of Amazon Bazaar, a new low-cost shopping destination for Asia, Africa, and Latin America that will be available...

item.title: Tesla delays reveal of production Roadster 2 to April Fools’ Day
item.description: Musk said he picked the date so he "could say I was just kidding" if it changes again. He had spent months teasing a reveal by the end of this year.
